BasicConnectivityPlotsScanConfig.title: BasicConnectivityPlotsScanConfig
BasicConnectivityPlotsScanConfig.description:
Class to generate basic connectivity plots and stats from a ConnectivityMatrix object.

Supported plot types:
  - "nodes": Node statistics (e.g., synapse class, layer, mtype).
  - "connectivity_pathway": Connection probabilities per pathway/grouping.
                            Not useful for small circuits.
  - "connectivity_global": Global connection probabilities across the network.
                            Not useful for small circuits
  - "small_adj_and_stats": Matrix and node statistics for small connectomes only (<= 20 nodes).
  - "network_in_2D": 2D visualization of the network for small connectomes only (<= 20 nodes).
  - "property_table": Table of node properties for small connectomes only (<= 20 nodes).

minf_eq.title: m_{\infty} equation
minf_eq.description: Steady state activation parameter \( m_{\infty} \) equation. This equation will be used for solving the differential equation: \( \frac{dm}{dt} = \frac{m_{\infty} - m}{\tau_{m}} \)

mtau_eq.title: \tau_m equation
mtau_eq.description: Activation time constant \(\tau_m\) equation. This equation will be used for solving the differential equation: \( \frac{dm}{dt} = \frac{m_{\infty} - m}{\tau_{m}} \)

hinf_eq.title: h_{\infty} equation
hinf_eq.description: Steady state inactivation parameter \(h_{\infty}\) equation. This equation will be used for solving the differential equation: \( \frac{dh}{dt} = \frac{h_{\infty} - h}{\tau_{h}} \)

htau_eq.title: \tau_h equation
htau_eq.description: Inactivation time constant \(\tau_h\) equation. This equation will be used for solving the differential equation: \( \frac{dh}{dt} = \frac{h_{\infty} - h}{\tau_{h}} \)

gate_exponents.title: m & h gate exponents
gate_exponents.description: Set the power of m and h gates used in Hodgkin-Huxley formalism: \(g = \bar{g} \cdot m^p \cdot h^q\)

MorphologyContainerizationScanConfig.title: MorphologyContainerizationScanConfig
MorphologyContainerizationScanConfig.description:
Creates a circuit with containerized morphologies instead of individual morphology files,
which involves the following steps:
(1) Copy circuit to output location
(2) Convert morphologies to .h5, if not yet existing (from .swc or .asc)
(3) Merge individual .h5 morphologies into an .h5 container
(4) Update the circuit config, pointing to the .h5 container
(5) Update .hoc files so that they will work with .h5 containers
(6) Delete all individual morphologies
(7) Check containerized morphologies
Important: The original circuit won't be modified! The circuit will be copied
           to the output location where all operations take place.

MorphologyDecontainerizationScanConfig.title: MorphologyDecontainerizationScanConfig
MorphologyDecontainerizationScanConfig.description:
Creates a circuit with individual morphology files instead of containerized morphologies,
which involves the following steps:
(1) Copy circuit to output location
(2) Extract individual .h5 morphologies from an .h5 container
(3) Convert .h5 morphologies to specified output format (.swc or .asc; skip if .h5)
(4) Update the circuit config, pointing to the individual morphology folder
(5) Delete .h5 container and .h5 files if that's not the specified output format
(7) Check loading individual morphologies
Important: The original circuit won't be modified! The circuit will be copied
           to the output location where all operations take place.

percentage_of_threshold_current_end.description: If given, the percentage of a cell's threshold current is interpolated such that the percentage reaches this value when the stimulus concludes.

RelativeLinearCurrentClampSomaticStimulu.title: Linear Somatic Current Clamp (Relative)
RelativeLinearCurrentClampSomaticStimulu.description:
A current injection which changes linearly as a percentage of each cell's threshold current
over time.

anyOf.title: Timestamps
anyOf.description: Timestamps at which the stimulus is applied.

anyOf.title: Neuron Set
anyOf.description: Neuron set to which the stimulus is applied.

timestamp_offset.title: Timestamp Offset
timestamp_offset.description: The offset of the stimulus relative to each timestamp in milliseconds (ms).

duration.title: Duration
duration.description: Time duration in milliseconds for how long input is activated.

mean_percentage_of_threshold_current.title: Percentage of Threshold Current (Mean)
mean_percentage_of_threshold_current.description: The mean value of current to inject as a percentage of a cell's                     threshold current.

variance.title: Variance
variance.description: The variance around the mean of current to inject using a                     normal distribution.

RelativeNormallyDistributedCurrentClampS.title: Normally Distributed Somatic Current Clamp (Relative)
RelativeNormallyDistributedCurrentClampS.description:
Normally distributed current injection around a mean percentage of each cell's threshold
current.

use_scaling.title: Scale U_SE (ACh)
use_scaling.description: Scale the U_SE (ACh) parameter of the Tsodyks-Markram synaptic model.

ScaleAcetylcholineUSESynapticManipulatio.title: Demo: Scale U_SE to Modulate Acetylcholine Effect on Synaptic Release Probability
ScaleAcetylcholineUSESynapticManipulatio.description:
Applying a scaling factor to the U_SE parameter.

The U_SE parameter determines the effect of achetylcholine (ACh) on synaptic release
probability using the Tsodyks-Markram synaptic model. This is applied for all synapses
between biophysical neurons.

sample_percentage.title: Sample (Percentage)
sample_percentage.description: Percentage of neurons to sample between 0 and 100%

property_filter.title: Property Filter
property_filter.description: NeuronPropertyFilter object or list of NeuronPropertyFilter objects
property_filter.name: Neuron property filter

central_neuron_id.title: Central Neuron Id
central_neuron_id.description: Node id (index) that will be source or target of the simplices extracted
central_neuron_id.name: Central neuron id

dim.title: Dim
dim.description: Dimension of the simplices to be extracted
dim.name: Dimension

central_neuron_simplex_position.title: Central Neuron Simplex Position
central_neuron_simplex_position.description: Position of the central neuron/node in the simplex, it can be either 'source' or 'target'
central_neuron_simplex_position.name: Central neuron simplex position

subsample.title: Subsample
subsample.description: Whether to subsample the set of nodes in the simplex lists or not
subsample.name: subsample

n_count_max.title: N Count Max
n_count_max.description: Maximum number of nodes to be subsampled
n_count_max.name: Max node count

subsample_method.title: Subsample Method
subsample_method.description:
**Method to subsample nodes**:
        - `random`: randomly selects nodes from all nodes in the simplices
        - `node_participation`: selects nodes with highest node participation
subsample_method.name: Method to subsample nodes from the extracted simplices

simplex_type.title: Simplex Type
simplex_type.description: Type of simplex to consider. See more at             https://openbraininstitute.github.io/connectome-analysis/network_topology/#src.connalysis.network.topology.simplex_counts
simplex_type.name: Simplex type

seed.title: Seed
seed.description: Seed used for random subsampling method
seed.name: seed

SimplexMembershipBasedNeuronSet.title: SimplexMembershipBasedNeuronSet
SimplexMembershipBasedNeuronSet.description:
Sample neurons from the set of neurons that form simplices.

Simplices of a given dimension with a chosen source or target 'central' neuron can be specified.

SimplexNeuronSet.title: SimplexNeuronSet
SimplexNeuronSet.description:
Get neurons that form simplices of a given dimension with a chosen source or target neuron.
If a smaller sample is required, it samples simplices while the number of nodes on them is still
smaller or equal than a set target size.

start_time.title: Start Time
start_time.description: Sart time of the timestamps in milliseconds (ms).

SingleTimestamp.title: Single Timestamp
SingleTimestamp.description: A single timestamp at a specified time.

anyOf.title: Timestamps
anyOf.description: Timestamps at which the stimulus is applied.

anyOf.title: Neuron Set
anyOf.description: Neuron set to which the stimulus is applied.

timestamp_offset.title: Timestamp Offset
timestamp_offset.description: The offset of the stimulus relative to each timestamp in milliseconds (ms).

duration.title: Duration
duration.description: Time duration in milliseconds for how long input is activated.

maximum_amplitude.title: Maximum Amplitude
maximum_amplitude.description: The maximum (and starting) amplitude of the sinusoid. Given in nanoamps (nA).

frequency.title: Frequency
frequency.description: The frequency of the waveform. Given in Hertz (Hz).

dt.title: Timestep
dt.description: Timestep of generated signal in milliseconds (ms).

SinusoidalCurrentClampSomaticStimulus.title: Sinusoidal Somatic Current Clamp (Absolute)
SinusoidalCurrentClampSomaticStimulus.description: A sinusoidal current injection with a fixed frequency and maximum absolute amplitude.

anyOf.title: Timestamps
anyOf.description: Timestamps at which the stimulus is applied.

timestamp_offset.title: Timestamp Offset
timestamp_offset.description: The offset of the stimulus relative to each timestamp in milliseconds (ms).

duration.title: Duration
duration.description: Time duration of the stimulus in milliseconds.

minimum_rate.title: Minimum Rate
minimum_rate.description:
Minimum rate of the stimulus in Hz.
 Must be less than the Maximum Rate.

maximum_rate.title: Maximum Rate
maximum_rate.description: Maximum rate of the stimulus in Hz. Must be greater than or equal to Minimum Rate.

modulation_frequency_hz.title: Modulation Frequency
modulation_frequency_hz.description: Frequency (Hz) of the sinusoidal modulation of the rate.

random_seed.title: Random Seed
random_seed.description: Seed for the random number generator to ensure reproducibility.

SinusoidalPoissonSpikeStimulus.title: Sinusoidal Poisson Spikes (Efferent)
SinusoidalPoissonSpikeStimulus.description:
Spike times drawn from an inhomogeneous Poisson process with sinusoidal rate.

Sinusoid defined by a minimum and maximum rate.

Sent from all neurons in the source neuron set to efferently connected
neurons in the target neuron set.

anyOf.title: Neuron Set
anyOf.description: Neuron set to record from.

dt.title: Timestep
dt.description: Interval between recording time steps in milliseconds (ms).

SomaVoltageRecording.title: Soma Voltage Recording (Full Experiment)
SomaVoltageRecording.description: Records the soma voltage of a neuron set for the full length of the experiment.

anyOf.title: Timestamps
anyOf.description: Timestamps at which the stimulus is applied.

anyOf.title: Neuron Set
anyOf.description: Neuron set to which the stimulus is applied.

timestamp_offset.title: Timestamp Offset
timestamp_offset.description: The offset of the stimulus relative to each timestamp in milliseconds (ms).

duration.title: Duration
duration.description: Time duration in milliseconds for how long input is activated.

percentage_below_threshold.title: Percentage Below Threshold
percentage_below_threshold.description: A percentage adjusted from 100 of a cell's threshold current.                         E.g. 20 will apply 80\% of the threshold current. Using a negative                             value will give more than 100. E.g. -20 will inject 120\% of the                                 threshold current.

SubthresholdCurrentClampSomaticStimulus.title: Subthreshold Somatic Current Clamp (Relative)
SubthresholdCurrentClampSomaticStimulus.description: A subthreshold current injection at a percentage below each cell's threshold current.

SynapticMgManipulation.title: Demo: Synaptic Mg2+ Concentration Manipulation
SynapticMgManipulation.description:
Manipulate the extracellular synaptic magnesium (Mg2+) concentration.

This is applied for all synapses between biophysical neurons.

ThermoFitMTauV2.title: Double exponential denominator equation with slope constraint for \tau_m

anyOf.description: Neuron set to record from.

dt.description: Interval between recording time steps in milliseconds (ms).

TimeWindowSomaVoltageRecording.description: Records the soma voltage of a neuron set over a specified time window.

TimestampsReference.description: A reference to a NeuronSet block.

nbS1POmInputs.title: Demo: nbS1 POm Inputs
nbS1POmInputs.description:
Virtual neurons projecting from the POm thalamic nucleus.

Specifically, virtual neurons projecting from the POm thalamic nucleus to biophysical
cortical neurons in the nbS1 model.

sample_percentage.title: Sample (Percentage)
sample_percentage.description: Percentage of neurons to sample between 0 and 100%

nbS1VPMInputs.title: Demo: nbS1 VPM Inputs
nbS1VPMInputs.description:
Virtual neurons projecting from the VPM thalamic nucleus.

Specifically, virtual neurons projecting from the VPM thalamic nucleus to biophysical
cortical neurons in the nbS1 model.

do_virtual.title: Do Virtual
do_virtual.description: Enable virtual neurons that target the cells contained in the specified neuron set to be split out and kept as virtual neurons together with their connectivity.
do_virtual.name: Do virtual

create_external.title: Create External
create_external.description: Enable external neurons that are outside the specified neuron set but target the cells contained therein to be turned into new virtual neurons together with their connectivity.
create_external.name: Create external

trace_id.title: Trace Id
trace_id.description: ID of the trace of interest.

protocols.title: Protocols
protocols.description: Type of stimuli requested by the user. Should be one                 of: 'spontaneous', 'idrest', 'idthreshold', 'apwaveform', 'iv', 'step', 'sponaps', 'firepattern', 'spontaneousnohold', 'starthold', 'startnohold', 'delta', 'sahp', 'idhyperpol', 'irdepol', 'irhyperpol', 'iddepol', 'apthreshold', 'hyperdepol', 'negcheops', 'poscheops', 'spikerec', 'sinespec', 'genericstep'.

requested_metrics.title: Requested Metrics
requested_metrics.description: Feature requested by the user. Should be one of 'spike_count','time_to_first_spike', 'time_to_last_spike','inv_time_to_first_spike', 'doublet_ISI', 'inv_first_ISI','ISI_log_slope', 'ISI_CV', 'irregularity_index', 'adaptation_index','mean_frequency', 'strict_burst_number', 'strict_burst_mean_freq','spikes_per_burst', 'AP_height', 'AP_amplitude', 'AP1_amp', 'APlast_amp','AP_duration_half_width', 'AHP_depth', 'AHP_time_from_peak','AP_peak_upstroke', 'AP_peak_downstroke', 'voltage_base','voltage_after_stim', 'ohmic_input_resistance_vb_ssse','steady_state_voltage_stimend', 'sag_amplitude','decay_time_constant_after_stim', 'depol_block_bool'

amplitude.description: Amplitude of the protocol (should be specified in nA).Can be a range of amplitudes with min and max valuesCan be None (if the user does not specify it) and all the amplitudes are going to be taken into account.

extracellular_calcium_concentration.title: Extracellular Calcium Concentration
extracellular_calcium_concentration.description: Extracellular calcium concentration around the synapse in millimoles (mM). Increasing this value increases the probability of synaptic vesicle release, which in turn increases the level of network activity. In vivo values are estimated to be ~0.9-1.2mM, whilst in vitro values are on the order of 2mM.

anyOf.description: Neuron set to simulate.

ion_channel_name.title: Ion channel name
ion_channel_name.description: The name you want to give to the generated ion channel model (used as SUFFIX in the mod file). Name must start with a letter or underscore, and can only contain letters, numbers, and underscores.

morphology.title: Morphology
morphology.description: The morphology skeleton to place locations on

Virtual neurons projecting from CA3 to CA1.
